markdownRemark.html:
Reselect with Redux: A Use Case

Reselect is a simple yet effective library in a sense it can cut down on computational and network intensive tasks. In case of Redux it can help achieve a derived value from existing reducers instead of creating a new reducer for holding a derived value or fetching it from server.
